definition[0]: to have a sexual relationship with someone who is not your usual partner
example[0]: It was years before I realized he’d been playing around.
example[1]: Wasn’t she playing around with another man?
definition[1]: to try doing something in different ways, to see what would be best, especially when this is fun
example[2]: Play around with the ingredients if you like.
definition[2]: to behave in a silly way or waste time, when you should be doing something more serious
example[3]: When the teacher wasn’t looking, we used to play about a lot.
